title: How to Find Your WeChat ID on Android: Simple Steps + More

steps.title: Open WeChat and tap Me.
steps.content: Open WeChat and tap Me . You'll see "Me" at the bottom-right corner of WeChat. [1] X Research source The WeChat ID is often referred to as your username, account name, user ID, or handle.

steps.title: Tap Account Security.
steps.content: Tap Account Security . You'll see this near the top of your settings.

steps.title: Tap WeChat ID to view your WeChat ID.
steps.content: Tap WeChat ID to view your WeChat ID. If you haven't changed your WeChat ID from the default, it will be a long set of letters and numbers. If you've set a custom WeChat ID, you'll see that here instead. Tapping your WeChat ID on this screen copies it to your Android's clipboard so you can paste it into texts, social media, emails, and more.

steps.title: Go to your WeChat ID in the WeChat app.
steps.content: Go to your WeChat ID in the WeChat app. To get there, tap Me at the bottom of WeChat, tap Settings (or tap your profile photo), then select Account Security .

steps.title: Tap your WeChat ID.
steps.content: Tap your WeChat ID. If you qualify to change your WeChat ID, you will see a "Change WeChat ID" button here.

steps.title: Tap Change WeChat ID.
steps.content: Tap Change WeChat ID . You'll be prompted to verify your WeChat password, and then you'll see a typing field. You can only change your WeChat ID once a year. If you've already changed it in the last year, you won't have the option to change it now. [2] X Research source If you can't change your WeChat ID but haven't changed it in the past year, you may have performed an action that raised a security concern on your account, such as changing your password, logging in from a new device, or freezing your account. Wait a few days and try again. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Enter a new WeChat ID and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter a new WeChat ID and tap Next . Your WeChat ID can be between 6 and 20 characters. Avoid using your name, birth date, or any personal details in your WeChat ID. [4] X Research source You'll be prompted to read and accept an important notice to continue. After you read the message and tap OK to confirm, your new WeChat ID will be active.

steps.title: Tap + at the top-right corner of WeChat.
steps.content: Tap + at the top-right corner of WeChat. If you know somebody's WeChat ID and want to find them on WeChat, you can search for their ID here. If you don't see the +, tap Chats at the bottom first. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Add Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Add Contacts . It's in the menu that popped up.

steps.title: Search for your friend's WeChat ID.
steps.content: Search for your friend's WeChat ID. Alternatively, if you don't know your friend's WeChat ID, you can search for their phone number.

steps.title: Select your friend and tap Add.
steps.content: Select your friend and tap Add . You'll see this button as long as you aren't already friends with this person or they haven't tightened their WeChat security to prevent people from adding them. [6] X Research source If you cannot find the person you're looking for, you can invite them to WeChat.

steps.title: Open your WeChat settings.
steps.content: Open your WeChat settings. To get there, tap Me at the bottom of WeChat, then tap Settings . If you want to delete your WeChat ID, you will need to send an account deletion request to WeChat. Deleting your WeChat ID is permanent.

steps.title: Tap Account Security.
steps.content: Tap Account Security . You'll see this on the Settings menu.

steps.title: Tap Account Cancellation and follow the on-screen instructions.
steps.content: Tap Account Cancellation and follow the on-screen instructions. After you submit your request, you will be logged out of WeChat. If you do not log back in within 60 days, your WeChat account will be deleted permanently. [7] X Research source If you see "Unable to Cancel," you'll be given instructions for troubleshooting the problem.

Your WeChat ID is only visible to contacts and members of mutual group chats . If a person isn't already one of your WeChat contacts, they can only view your WeChat ID if you're in a group chat together. [8] X Research source
